welcome_message: Welcome to the Digital Morocco Networking Platform!
excited_message: We're excited to welcome you aboard.
verification_instruction: To complete your account verification, kindly click the button below.
alternative_link_instruction: In case the button isn't functional, you can also copy and paste the following link into your browser:
expiry_warning: Please be aware that the verification link will expire after 1 hour. Ensure to complete the verification process within that timeframe.
support_message: Should you have any inquiries or require further assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team.
footer_msg: Expand your professional network, unlock exclusive resources, and connect with individuals and organizations dedicated to propelling Morocco's digital frontier.

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.description1: We've received a request to reset your password. Don't worry, we are here to help you.
reset_password.description2: we are here to help you.
reset_password.note2: You can safely ignore this message.
reset_password.footer: Copyright © 2023 Digital Morocco, All rights reserved. Powred By
reset_password.confirmMsg: You can now use your new password to log in by clicking the button below.
reset_password.confirmFooter: If you did not request this change, please contact our support immediately. Thank you!

ack_request.email_thank_you: Thank you for taking the time to contact us. Your request has been received, and we appreciate it.
ack_request.email_reviewing: Our team is currently reviewing your request and will provide you with a response as soon as possible. If you have any additional questions or would like to provide further information, please feel free to contact us.
ack_request.email_appreciation: We appreciate your patience and interest in our services.
ack_request.footer_message: Expand your professional network, unlock exclusive resources, and connect with individuals and organizations dedicated to propelling Morocco's digital frontier.

under_review.email_subject: Confirmation of Your Request on Digital Morocco
under_review.email_thank_you: Thank you for joining the Digital Morocco community. We have received your request, and it is currently under review.
under_review.email_reviewing: You will receive a notification once your request has been processed. In the meantime, we invite you to explore our platform to discover networking opportunities, collaborations, and upcoming events.
under_review.email_appreciation: For any questions or assistance, our team is at your disposal.
under_review.footer_message: Expand your professional network, unlock exclusive resources, and connect with individuals and organizations dedicated to propelling Morocco's digital frontier.

welcome_email.title: Welcome to
welcome_email.email_paragraph1: Get ready to unlock the full potential of your digital journey with us.
welcome_email.email_paragraph2: If you have any questions or need assistance along the way, feel free to reach out. We're here to support you every step of the way.
welcome_email.email_paragraph3: Let's embark on this exciting journey together!

request_approved.title: Request Approved
request_approved.email_paragraph1: We're excited to inform you that your request has been approved!
request_approved.email_paragraph2: You now have full access to the Digital Morocco platform. Explore networking opportunities, collaborations, and upcoming events at your leisure.
request_approved.email_paragraph3: Should you have any questions or need assistance, our team is here to help.
request_approved.footer_message: Expand your professional network, unlock exclusive resources, and connect with individuals and organizations dedicated to propelling Morocco's digital frontier.

request_reject.title: Rejection of Your Request on Digital Morocco
request_reject.email_paragraph1: We regret to inform you that your request has not been approved. We encourage you to review our admission criteria to better understand this decision.
request_reject.email_paragraph2: If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to contact our team.
request_reject.footer_message: Expand your professional network, unlock exclusive resources, and connect with individuals and organizations dedicated to propelling Morocco's digital frontier.
